Articles.Content:
Description

I didn't get "Set Speed Record of 2,500 m/s" despite speed indicator showing 2531 m/s. ship uses only stock parts.

Version

build id = 00830

2015.04.26 at 19:45:40 CEST

Branch: master

Screenshot

![D7D3A5A905BD523679E213A2BFFE1FCDB5662071](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/36370312385997839/D7D3A5A905BD523679E213A2BFFE1FCDB5662071/)
It is possible that the "Set Speed Record of 2,500 m/s" contract is only checking the surface speed and not the orbital speed which is shown on your navball.

I noticed on a lower speed record that it DID require the SURFACE speed to be above the listed value. As a side note, my 2500 m/s goal disappeared randomly just before the mission in which I surpassed that limit. It does not appear in my completed, failed, or cancelled contracts.
